abstract: Rio Tinto rebuffed a deal with Chinalco, and China arrested Rio workers on charges of taking bribes. But both sides are warily making amends.
snippet: Rio Tinto rebuffed a deal with Chinalco, and China arrested Rio workers on charges of taking bribes. But both sides are warily making amends.
lead_paragraph: Not long ago, China and the British-Australian mining giant Rio Tinto seemed to be locked in battle, David Barboza writes in The New York Times.

headline.main: Rio Tinto Strives to Repair Its China Ties
